newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Nordson EPS view lowered.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Nordson EPS view lowered.

text.p: - EVEREN Securities Inc said Tuesday it cut its fiscal second quarter earnings per share estimate for Nordson Corp to $0.75 from $0.81 and its fiscal 1997 estimate to $3.16 from $3.36.
- The six-month price target was lowered to $54 from $60 and the 18-month target to $59 from $64, EVEREN said.

- EVEREN analyst Quinten Nufer said an expected increase in demand from Japan and Europe does not appear to have materialized. In addition, foreign currency exchange is expected to negatively affect revenue in 1997.
- EVEREN said it is maintaining its market performer rating for the near term and its outperformer rating for the long term.
- Shares of Nordson were off 1-1/4 at 50.
